trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationInput" /> and <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationOutput" /> messages related to an XML Web service.
This class cannot be inherited.
An instance of this class will be returned by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.Messages%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation>.
trans-unit.target: Экземпляр этого класса будут возвращаться <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.Messages%2A> свойство родительского объекта <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation>.

trans-unit.source: As such, it can have exactly two members, one an <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationInput> and the other an <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationOutput>.
trans-unit.target: Таким образом, он может иметь ровно два члена, один <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationInput> , а другой <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationOutput>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" /> to add to the collection.
Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" /> to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessageCollection" />.
The zero-based index where the <paramref name="operationMessage" /> parameter has been added.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" /> for which to check collection membership.
Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" /> is a member of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessageCollection" />.

<see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="operationMessage" /> parameter is a member of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessageCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
An array of type <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" /> serving as the destination for the copy action.
The zero-based index at which to start placing the copied collection.

Copies the entire <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessageCollection" /> to a compatible one-dimensional array of type <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" />, starting at the specified zero-based index of the target array.
Gets the type of transmission supported by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessageCollection" />.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow" /> values.
The default is <see langword="SolicitResponse" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" /> for which to search in the collection.
Searches for the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" /> and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the collection.
The zero-based index of the specified operation message, or -1 if the element was not found in the collection.
Gets the first occurrence of an <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationInput" /> within the collection.
An <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationInput" /> within the collection.
The zero-based index at which to insert the <c>operationMessage</c> parameter.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" /> to add to the collection.

Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessageCollection" /> at the specified zero-based index.
If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Если количество элементов в коллекции уже равно ее емкости, емкость удваивается посредством автоматического перераспределения внутреннего массива перед добавлением нового элемента.

trans-unit.source: If the `index` parameter is equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, the `operationMessage` parameter is added to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Если `index` равен параметр <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, `operationMessage` параметр также добавляется в конец коллекции.

trans-unit.source: The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.
trans-unit.target: Элементы, следующие за точкой вставки вниз для размещения нового элемента.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" /> whose value is modified or returned.
Gets or sets the value of an <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" /> at the specified zero-based index.
An <see langword="OperationMessage" /> at the specified zero-based index.
Gets the first occurrence of an <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationOutput" /> within the collection.
An <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationOutput" /> within the collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" /> to remove from the collection.
Removes the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessageCollection" />.
This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Этот метод выполняет линейный поиск; Таким образом, среднее время выполнения пропорционально <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The elements that follow the removed <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage> move up to occupy the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: Элементы, следующие за удаленным <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage> перемещаются вверх, занимая освободившуюся позицию.
